metadata.name: Charity for Turkey
metadata.description:
On 6th Feb 2023, a 7.8-magnitude earthquake in southern Turkey early Monday killed more than 4,000 people there and in neighboring Syria, officials said, as rescuers searched flattened buildings in frigid weather for survivors.  
I wanna do something to help those poor innocent souls, so I made this artwork and this token will be available to claim on open edition and 100% of the sale will be donated for the victims.
